name: Fulgur
description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 3
Grade: B
Class: Military
Tried and tested by the UEE Navy on the Vanduul front, the Fulgur large power plant from Aegis Dynamics is now available for all to put to use protecting what’s important.
description_cn:
物品类型:发电机
制造商:圣盾动力(Aegis Dynamics)
尺寸：3
等级：B
类别：军用
圣盾动力的灿烂大型发电机由UEE海军在与剜度的战场上进行了试验和测试,现已面向全体公众出售,用以保护重要部分.
